page.title: 15SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: I am in the Fourth Year at Junior school and I am in the netball team.Today,we played the cricket team at netball_the netball team won!Tomorrow,we play against the teachers.The teachers have to dress up.Last year our headmaster dressed up as a ballet dancer.My position is Goal Shooter. There have been other sporting events this year like the Swimming Gala, football matches,cricket matches and the Cross_country race. We had a Sports Day earlier in the year when all the pupils have a race to run in. By Victoria Robinson.
